extracted_text: In order to address a moderate to high land use intensity pattern, single-family residential uses are allowed at a maximum of two (2) dwelling units per acre or 21,780 square feet excluding street right-of-way.

Low Impervious Cover Option: Single Family Residential - Development shall not exceed two (2) dwelling units per acre on a project-by-project basis. No residential lot shall be less than one-half (1/2) acre (or 21,780 square feet excluding street right-of-way).
llm_outputs.rationale: The Lake Norman Overlay (LN-O) section specifies minimum lot sizes for single-family residential uses. It states that single-family lots must be at least 21,780 square feet (1/2 acre) excluding street right-of-way.
